com.hazelcast.map.impl.eviction

Class EvictionCheckerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.eviction.EvictionCheckerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EvictionChecker

    public class EvictionCheckerImpl
extends Object
implements EvictionChecker
    Checks whether a specific threshold is exceeded or not according to configured MaxSizeConfig.MaxSizePolicy to start eviction process.
    See Also:
    EvictorImpl.evictionChecker

        Specified by:

        Returns:
